welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Burtonwood, a charming town known for its rich history and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that this beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Charter Terminal
terminals.description: The charter terminal at Liverpool John Lennon Airport is used for seasonal and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Manchester Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Manchester Airport, primarily used by low-cost carriers and long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Manchester Airport, used for domestic and European flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speed and data usage.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chester Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackpool Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal.
